articles.title: England women's cricket team not fit enough, says Alex Hartley
articles.description: England need to get fitter following their shambolic exit from the Women’s T20 World Cup, according to former spinner Alex Hartley.
articles.content:
Hartley used the example of Australia, the premier team in the world, continuing to overlook leg-spinner Amanda-Jade Wellington, who has not played international cricket since 2022.

articles.title: Aussie icon dropped in 40-year Ashes first
articles.description: Cricket Australia has confirmed the dates and venues for the 2025/26 Ashes, with the series opener moving away from Brisbane for the first time in more than four decades.
articles.content:
